title.narrative: Anhui Road Maintenance Innovation and Demonstration Project

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective (PDO) is to improve highway maintenance delivery and asset management capacity in the participating municipalities and county in Anhui Province.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Implementation arrangements | Description :Project Agreement. Section I.A.1 of the Schedule. The ProjectImplementing Entity shall maintain, and cause to be maintained, the PMO and the PIUs with composition, powers, functions, staffing,facilities and other resources satisfactory to the Bank. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Preparation of Annual Work Plan | Description :Project Agreement. Section I.A.2 of the Schedule. The ProjectImplementing Entity shall, and shall cause the Participating Municipalities and County, to: (a) carry out activities under theProject during each fiscal year in accordance with Annual Work Plans agreed with the Bank; (b) prepare and furnish to the Bank byDecember 15 in each year (beginning on February 28, 2017, for the calendar year 2017), a draft Annual Work Plan for review andcomment, summarizing the implementation progress of the Project for the said year and the Project activities to be undertaken forthe following calendar year, including the proposed annual budget for the Project; and (c) taking into account the Bank's comments,finalize and furnish to the Bank no later than December 31 in each year (except for the 2017 work plan, which should be finalizedno later than March 31, 2017), the Annual Work Plan, satisfactory to the Bank. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Preparation of mid-term review report | Description :Project Agreement. Section II.A.2 of the Schedule. Withoutlimitation to the provisions of paragraph A.1 above, the Project Implementing Entity (PIE) shall prepare, under terms of referencesatisfactory to the Bank, and furnish to the Bank no later than March 31, 2020, a consolidated mid-term review report for theProject, summarizing the results of the monitoring and evaluation activities carried out from the inception of the Project, andsetting out the measures recommended to ensure the efficient completion of the Project and to further the objectives thereof. | DueDate :31-Mar-2020

title.narrative: 7. Maintenance emergency response centers are established
4. Road safety measures implemented as part of the maintenance delivery (% coverageof sections with rehabilitation)
11. Citizen Engagement: Public uploads in CRAMS responded to
3. Length of roads improved/maintained by PBC
3. Proposed rehabilitation and periodic maintenance works program based on the recommendations of the asset management system
5. New maintenance technologies and materials applied in project roads
1. Roads in good and fair condition
2. Emergency events, under the jurisdiction of the emergency centers, responded to within required time limits
2. Decision-making "To Be" model developed and operational
6. Manuals covering all technologies prepared and disseminated
1. Road Asset Management Systems are updated
